description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Bacon Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Egg & Bacon Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Grease a 20cm (6cm deep) springform pan. Line base and 4cm up the side with shortcrust pastry, trimming edges. Refrigerate for 20 minutes.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add bacon and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until golden. Add onion and cook for a further 1 minute, stirring, or until softened. Remove from heat, stir in parsley and set aside to cool.
Line pastry case with baking paper. Fill with pie weights or uncooked rice and bake for 10 minutes. Remove weights and paper. Bake for a further 10 minutes or until light golden.

Scatter bacon mixture over pastry base. Whisk 2 eggs, cream and nutmeg together and season. Pour over bacon, reserving 1 tbs. Make 6 evenly spaced indents in bacon mixture and crack remaining eggs into each.

Cut a 20cm round from puff or rough pastry sheet and lay over filling, pressing edges to seal. Brush with reserved egg mixture and bake for 30-35 minutes or until filling is set and pastry is golden. Stand for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, line a baking tray with baking paper. Place tomatoes on tray and drizzle with vinegar and remaining oil, then season. Bake for the last 15 minutes of pie cooking time or until tomatoes just start to collapse. Serve pie topped with tomatoes and basil.
